Columns.Name: グループ既定値優先フラグ
既存建物旧計算方法フラグ
解析時見積添付フラグ
液状化判定必要フラグ
保証書原本郵送フラグ
付保証明書必要フラグ

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `main`.`group_id` AS `グループID`,`main`.`customer_id` AS `顧客ID`,`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` AS `グループ既定値優先フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`specify_surveying_customer_id` else `suba`.`specify_surveying_customer_id` end) AS `指定測量会社ID`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`existing_object_oldcalculate_flg` else `suba`.`existing_object_oldcalculate_flg` end) AS `既存建物旧計算方法フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`delivery_file_format` else `suba`.`delivery_file_format` end) AS `納品ファイル形式`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`construction_estimate_set_flg` else `suba`.`construction_estimate_set_flg` end) AS `解析時見積添付フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`study_paper_request_flg` else `suba`.`study_paper_request_flg` end) AS `検討書必要フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`liquefaction_assessment_flg` else `suba`.`liquefaction_assessment_flg` end) AS `液状化判定必要フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`specify_compaction_customer_id` else `suba`.`specify_compaction_customer_id` end) AS `指定転圧会社ID`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`no_compaction_judge_flg` else `suba`.`no_compaction_judge_flg` end) AS `転圧判定不可フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`no_compaction_estimate_flg` else `suba`.`no_compaction_estimate_flg` end) AS `転圧見積不要フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`comaction_other_construction_flg` else `suba`.`comaction_other_construction_flg` end) AS `転圧他社施工フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`compaction_re_survey_flg` else `suba`.`compaction_re_survey_flg` end) AS `転圧再調査フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`surplus_soil_disposal_flg` else `suba`.`surplus_soil_disposal_flg` end) AS `残土処分フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`no_construction_estimate_flg` else `suba`.`no_construction_estimate_flg` end) AS `工事見積不要フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`construction_cotract_flg` else `suba`.`construction_cotract_flg` end) AS `工事請負フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`warranty_period` else `suba`.`warranty_period` end) AS `既定保証期間`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`warranty_mailing_flg` else `suba`.`warranty_mailing_flg` end) AS `保証書原本郵送フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`mailing_commission_flg` else `suba`.`mailing_commission_flg` end) AS `郵送手数料フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`mailing_method_id` else `suba`.`mailing_method_id` end) AS `郵送方法ID`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`insurance_certificate_need_flg` else `suba`.`insurance_certificate_need_flg` end) AS `付保証明書必要フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`group_default_priority_flg` = 1) then `subb`.`warranty_additional_notes` else `suba`.`warranty_additional_notes` end) AS `保証追記事項` from (((`m_customer_group` `main` join `m_group` `sub` on((`main`.`group_id` = `sub`.`group_id`))) join `m_customer_default` `suba` on((`main`.`customer_id` = `suba`.`customer_id`))) left join `m_customer_default` `subb` on((`sub`.`customer_id` = `subb`.`customer_id`)))
